shortdesc.ph: The spatial position of the remote user or the media player.

p.codeblock: There are no corresponding names available

pd.props: native unreal bp electron rn cs

plentry.pd: The unit vector of the x axis in the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, and the three values represent the front, right, and top coordinates in turn.

The unit vector of the x axis in the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, and the three values represent the front, right, and top coordinates in turn. 前、右、上分别对应 Unity Vector3 的 z、x、y 轴的正方向。
